name: Shattered Moon (Holy Sausage Studios)
description:
Shattered Moon is a 2D Metroidvania game that utilises the benefits and disadvantages of transforming into a werewolf. 

The player must traverse the monster-filled world of gothic Plaigstead, exploring eerie buildings that shroud creepier beings without knowing what they will face next. 

The Cathedral, where the heart of the city still beats beneath the bedlam, awaits the player to uncover the truth and undo the chaos...
